content.prompt: In Paragraph 2, the author refers to "an epoch in the history of their minds" to

choices.label: illustrate the ways in which other intellectuals disagreed with Carlyle
define the meaning of the title Sartor Resartus
describe the major impact that Carlyle had on other people
characterize the arduous process of reading Sartor Resartus

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
